column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
good morning since yesterday i've been having tummy pain and throat ache
Good morning. It is important to determine the source of your discomfort in order to properly treat you. Are you having any other symptoms, such as fever, difficulty breathing, or nausea?

Nausea and fever can be symptoms of a number of illnesses, such as the flu, food poisoning, or even a stomach virus. I suggest speaking to your doctor or an urgent care center to get a proper diagnosis. In the meantime, drinking plenty of fluids and resting can help you feel better.
i also have tooth pain and swollen under my mandibula

Tooth pain and swelling under the mandible can be a sign of a dental issue, such as an infection or an abscess. I suggest seeing your dentist or an oral surgeon as soon as possible for an examination. Over-the-counter pain relievers, such as ibuprofen, can help reduce any discomfort in the meantime.
